Whether to vibrate on shutdown or not
Whether to enable animation on shutdown or not
Reset Display size to default (Auto reboot)
Settings most useful for tablet devices collected in one place. Also working for phones
Show status bar on bottom. Useful for tablets which use soft-buttons for home, menu, etc on status bar
Add a dead zone of half screen width to the middle of the status bar
Put soft-buttons on left side of status bar
When enabled, does not show the lockscreen or pattern screen. Neither on boot, nor when waking the device
Override the fullscreen request of applications. When enabled, status bar is always visible until hidden by button
Add home/back/menu actions to the power menu
Volume buttons behave normal. Press for volume change, long press for user action
Volume buttons behave reversed. Press for user action, long press for volume change
Assign home/back/menu/etc action to volume button up long press. Limited to screen on
Note: Some devices do a hard wired reset on both volume buttons+power pressed
enable/disable reverse rotation display\n Use this if device has wrong rotation\n (Requires Reboot)
Display style of AM/PM next to clock

While screen lock security is set to NONE only the security lock delay settings will be used
How long to delay before enabling screen security lock when screen times out
How long to delay before enabling screen security lock when screen is turned off
Even if enabled, the unsecured slide lock will only appear if the security lock delay is longer than the slide lock delay
Shows screen slide lock on a separate delay before showing security lock
How long to delay before enabling screen slide lock when screen times out
How long to delay before enabling screen slide lock when screen is turned off
Show Unread Message / Missed calls notifications
Enable/disable lockscreen rotation (require Auto-rotate screen enabled)
Text will be used in lockscreen
Put on your ear, and this will automatically dial number on your contacts, dialer or message
Long pressing HOME button on the lockscreen toggles the flashlight
Tap on center color to confirm.\nPress back to cancel
Choose a custom bootanimation from your sd card
Choose a custom shutdownanimation from your sd card
Choose a custom bootsound from your sd card
LED will pulse while screen is on
Pulses the LED in random colors for all notifications
Pulses the LED color in order
Add a category to the list
The category name may not contain \'=\'
Remove a category from the list
Edit the default settings for this category
Not all colors will display on all devices
Remove custom settings for this application
Configure how the LED should behave

This option has been proven to increase the amount of battery drain by ~3% per hour. If you notice an increase in drain during trackball lights pulsing then this option is why. Do not enable if you don\'t wish to incur the drain.
Disable the lockscreen if security screen lock (pattern, PIN, password) is enabled
Configure the lockscreen style and the corresponding settings
Enable or disable various widgets on the lockscreen
Controls button unlocking and quick unlock
Enable and configure gestures on the lockscreen to control custom behavior
Configure screen timeout delay and screen turn off delay
Display battery status on the lockscreen at all times
Toggle clock, date, carrier, status layout
Display music controls on the lockscreen
Display the name and artist of the song currently playing
Display the album art of the current song. Only works with stock music player in portrait mode
Display music controls when a wired headset and/or Bluetooth A2DP headset is connected
Display music controls regardless of whether or not music is playing
Pressing the trackball wakes the device
Pressing the volume up/down wakes the device. Intended for devices with hard to press power key
Pressing the trackball unlocks the device
Sliding out the keyboard unlocks the device
Pressing the menu button unlocks the device
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Shows a second set of sliders to launch a custom app
Shows a custom app dimple to launch a custom app
Shows a third ring to launch up to four custom apps
Switch unlock and app launcher rings
One ring in the middle to unlock
Choose image or color as lockscreen background
Use application icon for custom app
Uses application icon instead of CM icon for custom app starter
Dragging down rotary wheel unlocks. Dragging right starts custom app
Hides the directional hint arrows on rotary style
Choose the style of the lockscreen
Choose the style of the rotary wheel
Choose the style of the lock rings
Choose the style of the incoming calls accept/reject widget
Seek music tracks when long-pressing the volume buttons while screen off
Toggle play/pause when long-pressing the camera button while screen off
Choosing minimalistic lense style hides all widgets except music control. Yet below options are not unset to allow easy switching to other styles

Number of recent apps to display on long press home
Show recent apps without waiting for a long press
Use Task Switcher instead of recent apps
Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Use haptic feedback on keypress for softkeys and certain UI interactions
No haptic feedback on keypress for softkeys and certain UI interactions
Use haptic feedback on key release for softkeys and certain UI interactions
No haptic feedback on key release for softkeys and certain UI interactions
Use haptic feedback when making screen selections
No haptic feedback when making screen selections
REBOOT REQUIRED FOR CHANGES TO APPLY GLOBALLY
Adjusting haptic values for button DOWN-PRESSES\n(Virtual hardkeys and certain UI interactions.)
Adjusting haptic values for button RELEASES\n(Virtual hardkeys and most screen presses.)
Adjusting haptic values for on-screen keyboard taps
Press the Plus or Minus Buttons to add or remove steps in the sequence
Compress memory for increased virtual capacity (requires reboot)
Use the Dalvik just-in-time compiler (requires reboot)
Fix color banding and blur effect
Dithering improves image quality on some displays at the cost of performance (requires reboot)
Improve graphic effects but no guarrantee (requires reboot)
KSM reduces physical memory requirements and improves performance
Using 16bit transparency can improve scrolling performance, but may cause visual artifacts (requires reboot)
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
System can free more RAM when needed if asset bitmap memory can be reclaimed (requires reboot)
Maximum amount of memory per VM heap (requires reboot)
Don\'t show the boot animation for faster boot
Attempt to keep the current home app in memory at all times
Avoid lost messages on low memory situations
Make NetworkLocationService killable. Frees some RAM, but Latitude isn\'t reporting location any more (requires restart of Maps)
Size of the SD Read Ahead Cache

The options in here will change the performance of your system, potentially for the worse. They are included for experimentation and we request that you do not file bug reports if you have changed any from the defaults
You have calibrate the battery and this will also refresh the batterystats
Using expanded internal storage for apps and media (requires reboot)
Using removable card for apps and media (requires reboot)
This device doesn\'t have expanded internal storage
Allow moving of any application to external storage
Select where new applications should be installed

Apply moving average filter to sensor data to reduce flicker
Filtered value is the average sensor value during this period
Samples deviating this much from current average resets the filter
Low value can improve accuracy but uses some more CPU
Brightness used to dim the screen
Enable to allow lights to decrease. Use hysteresis to reduce flicker
Sensor levels overlap this much downwards

Prevents accidental unset of silent mode by pressing volume keys
Make volume control default to media instead of ringer

Disable back button to end call

Disable menu button to answer call

Warning!\nRevoking most permissions will most likely cause applications to malfunction. If an application with revoked permissions force-closes please grant the expected permissions or don\'t use the application.\nPlease DO NOT send bug reports to CyanMobile if an application with revoked permissions is not working as expected!
If Statusbar doesn\'t appears in 30 seconds.\nPlease reboot your device to bring back statusbar.
If you have problem with widget buttons.\nPlease enable or disable the buttons\nin widget buttons menu
